quote: It takes a minute to have a crush on someone, an hour to like someone, and a day to love someone... but it takes a lifetime to forget someone. – Kahlil Gibran
fact: A Boeing 747`s wingspan is longer than the Wright brother`s first flight.
joke: I got a reversible jacket for Christmas, I can't wait to see how it turns out.

sports_news.title: India defeats Australia in last-over thriller
